title: Bug 18705: Excessive flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash too much. This behavior is unexpected and disruptive to the user.
OB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames in the Control Example window should resize smoothly and without excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically.
SR:
To reproduce the issue in the Control Example:
1. Launch the Control Example
2. Resize the window vertically only
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively during the resizing process.
